grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1654" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-16" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;curved=0;" parent="1" source="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-1" target="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-11" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-18" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;curved=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-1" target="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-17" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-26" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;curved=0;" parent="1" source="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-1" target="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-24" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-1" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>post -&gt; extends _content</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ content: [post_text]</span><br></p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ publish_date: datetime</p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ expiry_date?: datetime</p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ image?: image</p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ alt_image: image (hard-coded default)</p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ status: string (predefined)</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="120" width="200" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-22" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;curved=0;" parent="1" source="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-2" target="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-21" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-2" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>post_text -&gt; extends _base</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ language_id: number</span><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ title: string</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ summary: string</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ content: string</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ seo: string</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ localised_image?: image</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ status: string (predefined)</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-80" y="500" width="200" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-7" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;curved=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-3" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="20" y="330" /> <mxPoint x="-100" y="330" /> <mxPoint x="-100" y="410" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-4" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;curved=0;" parent="1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;curved=0;" parent="1" source="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-6" target="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-11" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;curved=0;" parent="1" source="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-6" target="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-10" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-15" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;curved=0;" parent="1" source="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-6" target="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-10" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-6" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>_base</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ _id: GUID</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ type: string</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-360" y="200" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-8" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>image -&gt; extends _content</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ store: store</span><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ filename: string</span></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="330" width="200" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-10" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>language -&gt; extends _base</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ code: string</span><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ name: string</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ image: image</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-80" y="870" width="200" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-11" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>event -&gt; extends post</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ event_date: datetime</span><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ duration: number</span></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ fullday: boolean</span></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ recurrence: event_recurrence</span></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ alt_image: image (hard-coded default) - override</span></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="120" width="200" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-12" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>event_recurrence</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ type: event_recurrence_type<br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ day_of_week: number</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="850" width="200" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-14" value="How will event queries be done to create a calendar for a given time period?" style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="980" width="200" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-15" value="Should embedded content be linked to a post, or just rendered when rendering post content (dynamically loaded)?" style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="-120" width="200" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-17" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>video -&gt; extends post</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ hlsurl: string</span></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ alt_image: image (hard-coded default) - override<br></span></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="290" width="200" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-19" value="Need to support single-language downloads" style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="680" y="290" width="140" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-21" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>post_audio -&gt; extends post_text</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ audio_url: string<br></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="670" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-23" value="Optimised resolution? How to keep track of offline cached files?" style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="310" y="550" width="140" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-24" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>audio -&gt; extends post</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ alt_image: image (hard-coded default) - override</span><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ content: post_audio_collection (override)<br></span></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="440" width="200" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-25" value="Consider one content type with type selection between standard, audio, video (etc?)" style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-380" y="890" width="190" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ToMRt8nVkwL-cuO6ZL8g-27" value="Text format: WYSIWYG vs markdown?" style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="-140" width="200" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Sq-fa8tmbzy8xnyrfSvr-1" value="Bookmarks?" style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="480" width="140" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Sq-fa8tmbzy8xnyrfSvr-2" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>page -&gt; extends _content</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ content: content_collection</span></p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ image?: image</p><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); margin: 0px 0px 0px 4px;">+ alt_image: image (hard-coded default)</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="200" y="-40" width="200" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Sq-fa8tmbzy8xnyrfSvr-5" value="Best practices:<br>Avoid to have text on images - text should rather be generated to avoid "missing text" when an image is not cached offline." style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="930" y="680" width="350" height="195" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-1" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>tag -&gt; extends _base</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ data: [tag_data]</span></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ tag_type: string (predefined)</span></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-80" y="360" width="200" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-3" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>_content -&gt; extends _base</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ _id: number</p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;">+ tags: [tag]</p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-80" y="200" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-5" value="Tags are inheritable in a parent/child structure.<br><br>Tags can be used for<br><ul><li>Topic tagging (e.g. a child tag can be "faith", with a parent tag being "edification")</li><li>Access control tagging (inheritable access control system)</li><li>CMS access control tagging via roles tags (assign role tags to Cms system roles)</li><li>Category tagging (e.g. tagging per event, year, etc)</li></ul><div>Tag types are predefined.</div><div>Tags are solely used for tagging content. Access to system features are not controlled through tags but should be controlled through CMS roles</div>" style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=left;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-540" y="340" width="400" height="490" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-8" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=6;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#ff0800;" parent="1" source="Sq-fa8tmbzy8xnyrfSvr-2" target="Sq-fa8tmbzy8xnyrfSvr-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-170" y="80" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="410" y="-50" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-10" value="<p style="margin:0px;margin-top:4px;text-align:center;"><b>tag_data -&gt; extends _base</b></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ language_id: number</span><br></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ name: string</span></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ description: string<br></span></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ image: image</span></p><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><span style="background-color: initial;">+ default: boolean</span></p><hr size="1"><p style="margin:0px;margin-left:4px;"><br></p>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;overflow=fill;fontSize=12;fontFamily=Helvetica;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-80" y="720" width="200" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-12" value="Consider adding all post fields to standard post? Post is included in experiences based on set fields (e.g. if video field is set)" style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="790" y="120" width="210" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-13" value="post and post_text status:<br>draft, published, unpublished, etc." style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-120" y="-80" width="210" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-14" value="Should video's be handled in the same way as audio and text posts, i.e. that you need to add the video to each language's post_text (or post_content)? This will give more control and simplicity (generic way of handling data), but will add a little more work to publish a video to multiple languages." style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-780" y="-10" width="300" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mcw8HPPiKXNakIRfHLng-16" value="Subscriptions:<br>List of subscriptions to be available to user. Some subscriptions can be automatically selected based on e.g. region, login, etc." style="strokeWidth=1;shadow=0;dashed=0;align=center;html=1;shape=mxgraph.mockup.text.stickyNote2;fontColor=#666666;mainText=;fontSize=17;whiteSpace=wrap;fillColor=#ffffcc;strokeColor=#F62E00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="990" y="330" width="280" height="195" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
Best practices:
Avoid to have text on images - text should rather be generated to avoid "missing text" when an image is not cached offline.

div.div:
Tags are inheritable in a parent/child structure.
Tags can be used for
Topic tagging (e.g. a child tag can be "faith", with a parent tag being "edification")
Access control tagging (inheritable access control system)
CMS access control tagging via roles tags (assign role tags to Cms system roles)
Category tagging (e.g. tagging per event, year, etc)
Tag types are predefined.
Tags are solely used for tagging content. Access to system features are not controlled through tags but should be controlled through CMS roles

div.div: Should video's be handled in the same way as audio and text posts, i.e. that you need to add the video to each language's post_text (or post_content)? This will give more control and simplicity (generic way of handling data), but will add a little more work to publish a video to multiple languages.

div.div:
Subscriptions:
List of subscriptions to be available to user. Some subscriptions can be automatically selected based on e.g. region, login, etc.
